issue.title: lerp should be marked as noexcept

discussion.p: The overloads of lerp should be marked as noexcept, and this can be explained through the Lakos Rule. This function does not specify any undefined behaviour, and as such has no preconditions. This implies it has a wide contract, meaning it cannot throw, and thus can be marked as noexcept.
